tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rakshay Shetty has been our trusted pediatrician for the past four years, providing exceptional care for our daughter.  Dr. Rakshay Shetty consistently makes himself available and attentively listens to our concerns, ensuring thorough and effective treatment. He listens, cares, and never rushes to prescribe unnecessary medicines. Knowing he's always there and truly cares about our child's health gives us peace of mind. We're lucky to have him as our daughter's pediatrician.

Respected dr rakshay shetty

For what is a substantial sincere appreciation should be delivered to Dr rakshay shetty at rainbow hospital marathali. Who has heavily contributed towards th rescuing of my son who is identified by his term as Akkaraju lohit Nanda Mohan. From what I observed and depicted, his excellent attributes include his formal verbal capabilites towards his patients, his straight to the point responses to statements of abnormal difficulty within infants, and most importantly his professionalism towards his patients. I deliver my sincerest certificates of appreciate to this doctor, and I highly urge any parents to consult this professional

**** ****** ******* **** ***** **** ******* **** **** **** *** * ****** ********* ****** **** *** ********** He prescribed cholesterol,  protein, blood test,  urine test when my child was fine. He didn't even examine him. Straight away asked me take tests in lab. Won't recommend this doctor and not at all worth 850 rs fee. If u still wish to spend you can go ahead. * **** ****** **** ***** ** ****** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Superb doctor with excellent knowledge towards children…and most experienced and the explanation towards the problem is prompt and treatment is very clear in an experienced way

I met doctor at rainbow hospital for my kids. Improper organisation. So hurry. He calls 3 people at a time. He doesn’t allocate time for every kid. I had very bad experience.We again met another doctor.

Not a recommended doctor. We went for eye puffiness. He didn't even examine and straight away said protein deficiency. 
******* ** **** ********* **** ********* ******* ***** ** **********
Visited Doctor thrice to consult for our 6 month old child. Doctor didn't bother much to look at the child or listen to the parents concerns. Spent less than 5 mins each time. Wont recommend.
